New Records: Gerrit Cole tied Greg Maddux and Curt Schilling for 7th on the MLB all-time Playoffs pitcher wins list with 11.
Juan Soto has reached 20 singles in his playoffs career.
Aaron Judge has reached 30 walks in his playoffs career.
Gleyber Torres has reached 20 runs batted in in his playoffs career.
Tommy Pham has reached 30 singles in his playoffs career.
Key Match Events: Aaron Judge made a catch to secure the final out, helping the Yankees eliminate the Royals and advance to the ALCS.
Gerrit Cole held the Royals to a single run over seven innings.
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees advanced to the ALCS with a 3-1 victory over the Royals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees won by 2 runs or more to cover the spread.
The over/under was 8 and the teams scored 4 runs.
